Dialog.title: Simple Guide to build your own URL

FormattedText.htmlText: Select the dashboard type for which you would like to create an URL.
A list of the existing dashboards is provided by the value search help.
You can add filter parameters and user parameters to your URL by using the ‘Add Filter’ and ‘Add Parameter’ buttons.
Multiple filters and parameters can be added. For both, filters and parameters, the existing possible options are displayed in a popup.

After selecting a filter or a parameter, a popup to place your input is shown. In this popup, the possible values for the previously selected filters or parameters are displayed, if available. Alternatively, your individual input is required.
Press button ‘Generate URL’ to build the URL composed of the selected dashboard type, the filters and the other parameters.
The URL is displayed in a popup and can be modified here according to your needs.
Here you can also decide to open the URL directly in your browser or not.
